job.title: Software Sr Engineer Specialty RWF
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongImportant Note strongDuring the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrstrongTechnologystrong sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrCorporate amp Investment Banking delivers a comprehensive suite of capital markets banking and financial products and services A trusted partner to our clients we provide corporate and transactional banking commercial real estate lending and servicing investment banking equity and fixed income solutions including sales trading and research capabilities to corporate commercial real estate government and institutional clients across the globebrbrThis position is for a lead the Wells Fargo Securities LOBbrbrstronguResponsibilities Includebrustrongul liEnd to end ownership of assigned project or task related to RMBS regulatory deliverablesli liLead or be part of an Agile team to deliver RMBS regulatory solutionsli liEngaging with multiple stakeholders including technology partners business partners Market risk front office Quant teams technology and business project management teams among others to enable delivery of RMBS regulatory projectsli liResponsible for adding technology items to the overall project plan providing updates and escalating items as neededli liBuilding relationships and maintaining constant productive communication with the Wells Fargo Securities LOBli liContributing to the short and long term vision for the RMBS team and the org as a wholebrliulEmployees support our focus on building strong customer relationships balanced with a strong risk mitigating and compliancedriven culture which firmly establishes those disciplines as critical to the success of our customers and company They are accountable for execution of all applicable risk programs Credit Market Financial Crimes Operational Regulatory Compliance which includes effectively following and adhering to applicable Wells Fargo policies and procedures appropriately fulfilling risk and compliance obligations timely and effective escalation and remediation of issues and making sound risk decisions There is emphasis on proactive monitoring governance risk identification and escalation as well as making sound risk decisions commensurate with the business units risk appetite and all risk and compliance program requirementsbrbrstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli10 years of software engineering experiencelili7 years of experience in one or a combination of the following securities quants artificial or higher in computer science or financeliliA professional certification in technologyliliBasic knowledge of industry regulations related to building technological solutionslili4 years of SQL experiencebrbrliulstronguOther Desired Qualificationsbrustrongul liExperience working in a highly dynamic environment with occasional ambiguous requirementsli liExperience being versatile ability to work on multiple items and ability to switch context as neededli liExperience wearing many hats including planning coding infrastructure tasks scripting QA support li liExperience working with multiple teams in technology and the business Highly desirable to have experience working with quant teamsli liExperience delivering on large scale projects including requirements gathering project planning and taking end to end ownership of the project li liExperience working with IBM Symphony Gridli li1 year of experience working with Polypaths Grid infrastructureli li1 year of experience working with Polypaths modelsbrbrbrliulstrongSalary InformationbrbrstrongTo be determinedbrbrstrongStreet AddressbrbrstrongstrongNCCharlotte strong301 S College St  Charlotte
